title: Replace hero section logo with animated video

requirements.summary: Replace static LookyLoo-logo.png in hero section with LookyLoo-gif.mp4 animated video while maintaining positioning and styling
acceptanceCriteria: The hero section displays LookyLoo-gif.mp4 as an auto-playing looped video
The video maintains the same center positioning as the previous logo
The video styling matches the dimensions and appearance of the original logo placement
The static LookyLoo-logo.png is no longer used in the hero section

file_operations.description: Replace the static image element displaying LookyLoo-logo.png with a video element that displays the uploaded LookyLoo-gif.mp4 file. Configure the video element with autoplay, loop, muted, and playsInline attributes to ensure continuous playback. Maintain the exact same positioning (centered via flexbox) and styling (max width constraints) currently applied to the logo image. Update the src path to reference the video file in the public assets directory.
